name: Freestyle
effect: The player spends one week practicing freestyle swimming. Swim speed is increased by 50%.
reqs: A body of water of suitable depth.

name: Lung Capacity
effect: The player spends one week practicing holding their breath and diving under water. After persistent practice, the player learns to hold their breath for 50% longer than normal.
reqs: A body of water of suitable depth.

name: Leaping and Landing
effect: The player spends one week practicing jumping from one surface to another, landing on a variety of terrain types. Jump height and distance are increased by 50%. The player gains a 1d4 bonus when making saving throws to avoid landing prone.

name: Falling
effect: The player practices landing on various surfaces from various heights, using a rolling technique whereby weight is distributed between the feet, legs, buttocks, and shoulders. Having learned various falling techniques, fall damage is reduced by 10 + 1d10.

name: Horseback Riding
effect: The player learns to ride a saddle and control a horse via bridle. The player can now attempt mounted attacks from horseback,

name: Vertical Escape
effect: The player learns to use the grappling hook to make a hasty escape. If surroundings are appropriate, the player can throw the hook up to 30 feet vertically as an action. On a successful DT 12 {{skills.mobility}} check, the grappling hook latches. The player can use an action to climb 10 feet up the rope, away from enemy melee attacks.

name: Wall Run
effect: The player learns to run a short distance along or up walls, and to leap backwards off of them.
